name: aMAZE Frozen
description: aMAZE Frozen is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with calm soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 Procesador: Intel or AMD 2 GHz Memoria: 2 GB de RAM Gráficos: Any Almacenamiento: 300 MB de espacio disponible
